about_the_game:
This 3D model resource pack contains a total of 168 types of Western and Japanese style furniture and decorations to decorate indoor maps.

Contents Details
  • Luxury Furniture:40
  • Vintage furniture: 33
  • Victorian furniture: 36
  • Chic furniture: 17
  • Children's furniture: 8
  • Country furniture: 9
  • Girly furniture: 8
  • Japanese style furniture:8
    [Modern furniture:9

name: RPG Developer Bakin Furnitures & Ornaments Pack Vol.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This 3D model resource pack contains a total of 168 types of Western and Japanese style furniture and decorations to decorate indoor maps.
